Name: Kimet
description:
Kimet is a villager who wants to buy a trailer and plug for his agricultural tractor. 

Kimet is married and is a father of two; he is in his early 60s. Agriculture has been his practice by choice now for very long time, according to him. Here  is what he said during his interview with the Branch Assistant:  “I love nature, food, doing physical work and also I love independence. So, this type of activity, has given me all of these. And I am very happy doing agriculture.” 

Kimet plants and sells in large quantities mostly potatoes and barley. He has a dairy cow to cover for his family’s dairy needs and also he sells apples from his own orchards.
